topic.title: ZeroNet and Emercoin blockchain domain zones
topic.body:
Dear ZeroNet team, 

Greetings from Emercoin team

We like very much the idea of ZeroNet and especially the implementation. 
We would be very happy if ZeroNet could support Emercoin blockchain domain zones - * .lib, coin, emc, bazar.

We have many interesting features and related services that could be useful to you. 
For example blockchain-based magnet links and many others.
We would be happy to collaborate with you.

Waiting for your answer, 
Sincerely, Eugene Shumilov
Emercoin CEO

mechnotech@emercoin.com

1604065607_mirrored_mechnotech_github.body:
> Emercoin has Proof-of-Stake, does it also have the centralized checkpointing component?

We have decentralized ones. But in the next release we will reject soft checkpoint at all.
